articles.title: Craig Wright Reportedly Must Give 50% of Mined Bitcoin to Kleiman Estate
articles.description: Self-proclaimed Satoshi Nakamoto Craig Wright suffered a massive blow today when a judge reportedly ordered him to turn over 50% of the bitcoin he mined with his former business associate, deceased computer genius Dave Kleiman. Florida federal judge Bruce Rei…
